channel.title: I Need Help With a cupile of stuff!
channel.description:
Hello I need help with some stuff:
1How to make a npc and get it to be still
2How to make a npc talk
3How to change commands
4How to make shops
I look at the Unlimate Guide but i dont get it !
Thanks, Nintendo[br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2007, 07:06:06 PM[/size][hr]Help me Please !

item.title: I Need Help With a cupile of stuff!
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

what doesn’t work? you mean the npc’s arn’t there. if you tell me the coordinates of where you want the npcs to be, then tell me what npc you want there, ill edit it for you and send the code via this topic and i’ll show you how to add too.

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help With a cupile of stuff!
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

Basically:

description= name of the npc.
range=where the npc will walk to-keep this the same as the coordinates of x and y, to spawn the npc, if you dont want them to move.
walk type=how it will walk, 1=default

Read full topic

item.source: I Need Help With a cupile of stuff!

item.title: I Need Help With a cupile of stuff!
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

the ranges are where the npc can travel to, that why you need to keep them the same because you don’t want them to move, if you wanted the npc’s to move, you would move from the spot of the spawning point and walk away to a point they can move to. walk type is just the way they will walk, just keep that as “1” no quotational marks, the description is the name of the npc, e.g. jad.

Read full topic

item.source: I Need Help With a cupile of stuff!

item.title: I Need Help With a cupile of stuff!
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

i used that as an example.
Heres a betetr one:

spawn = NPC ID	COORD X	COORD Y	HIGHT	RANGE X	RANGE Y	RANGE X	RANGE Y	WALK TYPE	NAME OF NPC

Change the NPC ID to the id of the npc, change COORD X to the x coordinate of where you want the npc to spawn, change COORD Y to the y cooridinate you want to spawn it at, if you want the npc to stay still, keep both RANGE X’s and RANGE Y’s the same as the COORD X and COORD Y.
The walktype just leave as default (1) And then anter the name of the npc in NAME OF NPC

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help With a cupile of stuff!
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

  1. To make and npc stay still. go to autospawn.cfg and place in the npc id, then the first set of coordinates, then chnage the coordinates after it exactly the same.
    e.g.
spawn = 2745	2375	5068	0	2745	5068	2745	5068	1	Jad

That would keep jad still in that place.

  1. To make an npc talk, you can easily find this in the tutorial list by lothy.

  2. changing commands,
    search for:

else if(command

Then go to then add:

else if command.equalsignoreCase((''commandname'')) { teleportToX = coordX; teleportToY = coordY;

change the commandname to the command name of course
and then change coordX; to the x coordinate u want to tele to, and the same with coordY;

  1. to make shops, not a pro at this, check the tuts.

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help With a cupile of stuff!
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

[quote=“Nintendo, post:1, topic:72504”]Hello I need help with some stuff:

1How to make a npc and get it to be still

2How to make a npc talk

3How to change commands

4How to make shops

       I look at the Unlimate Guide but i dont get it !

     Thanks,
          Nintendo[br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2007, 07:06:06 PM[/size][hr]Help me Please ![/quote]
  1. heres an example in your autospawn.

spawn = 526 2958 3387 0 2960 3390 2953 3385 There are many different things to this, the first bit of number is the npc id, the 2nd and 3rd are the position the npc is placed, the 4th is the hight level, the 5th,6th,7th, and 8th are the area that it walks in to make an npc stand still just set the 5th,6th,7th, and 8th to 0, like this

spawn = 526	2958	3387	0	0	0	0	0

  1. Are you searching for the text above the npcs head, or the text in the dialogue box that is located in the chat box?

  2. What kind of commands? (teleport, spawn, adding xp, ect.)

Read full topic
